meanings.definition: A plant of the goosefoot family, including spinach and beets.
meanings.sent1: The chenopods in the garden are growing well.
meanings.sent2: Spinach and beets are common chenopods.
meanings.sent3: The chenopods decided to have a dance party in the vegetable patch.
meanings.sent4: The chenopods stood tall like guardians of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green chenopods swayed gracefully in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Chenopodium.
meanings.sent1: I planted some chenopods in my backyard.
meanings.sent2: Chenopodium is a diverse group of chenopods.
meanings.sent3: The chenopods threw a surprise party for the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The chenopods spread across the field like a green carpet.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh chenopods filled the air with a pleasant scent.

meanings.definition: A member of the Chenopodiaceae family.
meanings.sent1: The chenopods in the botanical garden are fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The chenopods organized a family reunion for all the plants.
meanings.sent4: The chenopods linked arms, forming a protective circle.
meanings.sent5: The chenopods' leaves shimmered under the sunlight, a beautiful sight.
